mapper.select: select v.vid , v.vtitle , v.vlink , l.lid from lecture l inner JOIN video v ON l.lid = v.lid WHERE l.lid = #{lid}
mapper.insert: insert into video(vtitle, vlink, lid) values(#{vtitle}, #{vlink}, #{lid});
mapper.select: select l.lid, ltitle from lecture l left JOIN video v ON l.lid = v.lid where l.lid = #{lid} limit 1
